title: Did the Republic of Cheney accuse the indigenous tribes of "destroying our way of Western life "?
subtitle: A coalition of Native American tribes, groups and individuals fought for Yellowstone Grisley's re-listing under the Endangered Species Act.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: The U.S. Republic of Liz Cheney accused tribes of "destroying our Western way of life" because of the court-ordered protection of the Gray Bear Yellowstone.
